idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

descript.abstract: The Oregon and Washington commercial fishing blocks are based on charts included with the WA-OR-CA Pacific Fishery Management Council Trawl Logbook.
descript.purpose: Originally created to represent generalized spatial locations for Oregon and Washington catch data used in the Mineral Management Service Fisheries Resource Database (2003).
descript.supplinf: In 2008, coastal boundaries in this file were edited to match the state and province base layers used in the Pacific Coast Fisheries GIS Resource Database.

citeinfo.origin: CA Department of Fish and Game, Biogeographic Data Branch, Office of Spill Prevention and Response
citeinfo.title: Oregon and Washington Commercial Fishing Blocks
citeinfo.othercit: 2008 Modification by US Geological Survey Western Ecological Research Center, Dixon Field Station: Coastal blocks edited to more closely follow CA, OR, WA Trawl Logbook fishing block chart.

idinfo.accconst: These data are released on condition that the California Department of Fish and Game, U.S. Geological Survey, Bureau of Ocean Energy Management, Regulation and Enforcement, or United States Government may not be held liable for any damages resulting from authorized or unauthorized use.
idinfo.useconst: Data may only be used within the context of this Pacific Coast Fisheries GIS Resource Database, intended for coastal wildlife and marine resource managers.

cntorgp.cntorg: CA Department of Fish and Game, Biogeographic Data Branch, Office of Spill Prevention and Response

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in square meters.
Fishing block identifier, double data type.

cntorgp.cntorg: USGS, Biological Resources Discipline, Western Ecological Research Center

procstep.procdesc: This file was included with the MMS Fisheries Resource Database without Metadata. The originator of the file was contacted in 2008 to generate this metadata.

distinfo.distliab:

Any use of trade, product, or firm names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government.
